type.name: org.gradle.tooling.events.task.TaskSkippedResult
type.description:
Describes how a task operation was skipped.
(since 2.5)

method.name: getSkipMessage
method.description:
Returns a message describing the reason for skipping the task.

returns:the message describing the skip reason

property.name: skipMessage
property.description:
Returns a message describing the reason for skipping the task.

returns:the message describing the skip reason
